pageProduct.name: Anthogenol 100 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Anthogenol is a naturally derived health supplement based on the proprietary isolation of OPCs (oligomeric proanthocyanidins). It has a powerful antioxidant effect (15 times greater than Vitamin C and 50 times greater than Vitamin E). Working at a cellular level, it provides protection from ravaging free radicals.

Warnings

Always read the label. Follow the directions before use. If symptoms persist, worsen or change unexpectedly talk to your health professional. Supplements may only be of assistance if dietary intake is inadequate

Common Uses

Anthogenol is a naturally derived health supplement based on the proprietary isolation of OPCs (oligomeric proanthocyanidins). It has a powerful antioxidant effect (15 times greater than Vitamin C and 50 times greater than Vitamin E). Working at a cellular level, it provides protection from ravaging free radicals.

Healthy Circulation
Maintains healthy circulatory function in the legs, eyes and skin
May help yo protect the veins from the effects of destructive enzymes
May help strengthen capillary walls and protect cell membranes reducing the occurrence of varicose and spider veins
                                                                                  Heart and Eye Health
May help prevent or slow the effects of destructive enzymes on collagen for the maintenance of cardiovascular health
Provides nutritional support, protecting the health of the heart and eyes
                                                                                            Beautiful Skin, Hair and Nails
Protects against the breakdown of skin collagen and elastin
- visibly reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
- improving the suppleness and overall quality of the skin
May help diminish age spots
May help increase the thickness of hair and strength of nails
                                                                                           Energy and Vitality
May increase energy and vitality, enhance sports performance and speed recovery from injuries
A growing number of evidence-based studies from around the world reinforce the health benefits of antioxidants on ageing and protection from age-related conditions. The OPCs in Anthogenol are backed by numerous clinical studies and many years of experience.

Ingredients

Vitis vinifera (Grape Seed) extract equivalent to dry seed 12 g
 40 mg Ascorbic acid (Vitamin C)
 20 mg Silicon dioxide

Directions

Take 1 capsule daily before meal to assist general health. For eye and heart health, take one capsule two to three times daily before meals. For vericose veins take one capsule three times daily before meals.
